name: Modules.Map.Polyline
summary: Represents a bounded area on the map.

properties.name: jointType
properties.description: Defines the shape of corner points. Can be one of the following shapes: POLYLINE_JOINT_DEFAULT, POLYLINE_JOINT_ROUND or POLYLINE_JOINT_BEVEL

properties.name: pattern
properties.description:
As per default polylines are drawn with a solid line. You can specify to draw them with a dashed line using POLYLINE_PATTERN_DASHED or with a dotted line using POLYLINE_PATTERN_DOTTED.

You can also specify the dimensions to use when you create a dashed or dotted polyline.

For a dashed polyline, you can do something like this:

polyline.setPattern({
    type: TiMap.POLYLINE_PATTERN_DASHED,
    gapLength: 25,
    dashLength: 50
});

or for a dotted polyline, you can do:

polyline.setPattern({
    type: TiMap.POLYLINE_PATTERN_DOTTED,
    gapLength: 25
});

properties.name: points
properties.summary: Array of map points making up the polyline. Can also be an array of longitude (index 0), latitude (index 1) touples. On Android platform you can use an encoded polyline as string.

properties.name: strokeColor
properties.summary: Color to use for the the polyline, as a color name or hex triplet.
properties.description: For information about color values, see the "Colors" section of Titanium.UI.

properties.name: strokeWidth
properties.summary: Line width in pixels to use when drawing the polyline.

properties.name: touchEnabled
properties.summary: Determines whether view should receive touch events.

properties.name: zIndex
properties.summary: The order (depth) in which to display the polylines.
properties.description: For iOS, the polylines are drawn in the order in which they are added.
